subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Nothin'!
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
--_3c0d8700-870f-4164-abe1-a936a0cd8d2c_
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable


 The ones that move beyond this Earth level, don't talk anymore, except ma=
ybe the more enlightened ones that come back. My mother in-law used to talk=
 all the time, but one day another spirit said she got a new body and moved=
 up two steps, and that's last I heard of the mother in-law. More than just=
 a whisp of ecto-junk we are. 
 
 Frank


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: =
warrior18eii@...: Tue, 6 Nov 2007 05:52:37 -0800Subject: Re: [EVP=
-ITC] Nothin'!






Once again I think it comes down to our expectations a=
gain. I think to many people expect a lot of these spirits to have some kin=
d of special insight or access to some grand knowledge. I think that the on=
ly difference between a lot of them and us are that they have transitioned =
beyond the physical and that is it. No matter how hard you try you cannot s=
hake the "earth" vibration and you will continue to contact those close to =
the "earth" vibration. In order to contact the higher beings by technical m=
eans we have to gain their interest and they have to come to us. We cannot =
transcend our level to go to them without accessing higher levels of consci=
ousness, which requires more than switching on a recorder.Best regards,Fran=
k R.
----- Original Message ----From: Tracy <loneshewolf999@...>To: E=
VP-ITC@yahoogroups.comSent: Monday, November 5, 2007 1:37:50 PMSubject: Re:=
 [EVP-ITC] Nothin'!


very well said Frank.  With some of them, I think it =
is a game that they like to play.  John Keel has written about the nature o=
f these guys that like to play this game, if you haven't read "mothman prop=
hecies" (the book, not the movie) check it out.  
I think it warrants conti=
nuing.  The unitiated soon become baptised quickly after several rounds and=
 if they land at the bottom of the rabbits hole instead, hopefully they kno=
w which pill to take to make them small *grin*Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@=
 hotmail.com> wrote:


This is what troubles me, I get these supposed Earth=
quake predictions, the last one fairly specific, and --nothin'! It was supp=
osed to be for China, today. That's what I try to get across, you can't tak=
e this shit like it's written in stone, or some kind of friggin' gospel, as=
 most seem prone to do. So far, irregardless of how clear the voice is, or =
what method is used, the only thing that can be said with certainty is that=
 they consistently lie! Personally I seem to get just enough "truth" to kee=
p me hooked. I don't think you can say with any certainty it's sprits of th=
e deceased, at least not all of it, there's that level of deception that I =
don't kow what do to with. When someone tells me they have the knowledge to=
 know what questions to ask to verify the personality, I have to conclude t=
hey are absolutely clueless. I don't care how many books they've written, o=
r how many "universities" they've given. When something knows how you think=
, what you are perceiving, and how it's being perceived, you can't prevent =
yourself from being deceived, or more like played with. I know I'll be dece=
ived, and tricked, and I tell them have fun with that, cuz I don't really c=
are. I'm not after any particular spirit, or piece of knowledge.    When th=
ese voices tell someone not to share the information, that's even thinner i=
ce to on!  I still, everyday, question the value of this work, and if it wa=
rrents continuing. I can do this on my own, but I don't want to drag the un=
itiated into hell with me! I find the communication mode itself facsinating=
, and don't expect that profound paranormal knowledge others seem to seek. =
I don't care who is talking through the box.  I think those seeking those b=
its of profound knowledge, or secrets will get lead right down the rabbit h=
ole.   Frank-SPeek-a-boo FREE Tricks Treats for You! Get 'em!
